relics.name: Potion of Courage
relics.description: Start each Elite combat with 3 Strength.

relics.name: Business Card Printer
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add a Business_Card into your hand.
relics.flavorText: Look at that subtle off-white color. The tasteful thickness of it. Oh my God, it even has a watermark.

relics.name: Bank Deed
relics.description: Whenever you climb a floor, gain 5% interest on held Gold.

relics.name: Bottled Funds
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card. At the start of each combat, play and Exhaust a copy of it.

relics.name: Lucky Clover
relics.description: 66% chance to gain [E] at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Ingest
keywords.description: Ingesting Sync Boons activates one of your Destiny Reactors based on the number and type of Ingested Sync Boons.

keywords.name: Run
keywords.description: After Running a certain amount of times, escape combat. If you're fighting a boss, deal 100 damage to ALL enemies instead. Escaping gets harder every time you escape.

keywords.name: Boost points
keywords.description: Boost Points increment the Double Tricks of your Destiny Reactors whenever you Gather a Pyro Buddy.

keywords.name: Business card
keywords.description: Whenever you play 10 Business Cards, obtain a Relic.

keywords.name: Gathered
keywords.description: Gathering a Pyro Buddy places it into your centremost Storage Centre.

keywords.name: Investment
keywords.description: Whenever you play 3 Investments, obtain a Relic.

keywords.name: Pyro buddies
keywords.description: Pyro Buddies can be Gathered into your Storage Centres whereupon they will Generate Sync Boons based on their Type.

keywords.name: Sync boons
keywords.description: Sync Boons activate your Destiny Reactors when Ingested and supply a passive effect to your Pyro Buddies.
